channel.description: Recent content in Core Concepts on

item.title: Architecture
item.description: The architecture block is the root element of any Sruja model.

item.title: System
item.description: A System represents a software system, the highest level of abstraction in the C4 model.

item.title: Container
item.description: A Container represents an application or a data store.

item.title: Component
item.description: A Component is a grouping of related functionality encapsulated behind a well-defined interface.

item.title: Relations
item.description: Relations describe how elements interact with each other.

item.title: Person
item.description: A Person represents a human user of your software system.

item.title: DataStore
item.description: A DataStore represents a database, file system, or any other system that stores data.

item.title: Queue
item.description: A Queue represents a message queue, topic, or event stream.

item.title: Deployment
item.description: The Deployment view allows you to map your software containers to infrastructure.

item.title: Architecture Decision Records (ADR)
item.description: Capture architecture decisions directly in your model.

item.title: Metadata & Tags
item.description: Attach additional information to your elements using Metadata and Tags.
